Package game.time

package game.time
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    game
     
  • Class
    Description
    AfternoonPhase
    Afternoon – neutral, no changes.
    EveningPhase
    Represents the evening phase of the game.
    MorningPhase
    Morning – a sandstorm pushes the player one tile in a random direction.
    NightPhase
    Represents the night phase of the game.
    TimeController
    Invisible actor that drives the TimeManager each turn.
    TimeManager
    Tracks the passage of time, cycles through TimePhase instances every 4 ticks, and applies their effects to the game map.
    TimePhase
    Defines a period-of-day’s behavior.
